column4: Allows to change appearance. When a sorceress, allows to customize spells as well.
Not allowed to equip items in slot:
Welcome to Custom Player Characters (CPC) Mod!

Special "{2115940098}" potion was added to your inventory. Use it and exit inventory to launch player setup scene.

Important note: until you decide to use potion, the mod has zero impact on your game.

Good luck on the Path!
You have reached new magic level!
You have learned new magic skill!

You have basic magic skills:
- {2115940118} ({2115940122}, {2115940140}: {2115940141}/{2115940142})
{1077642}/{1084067}: Press "Light attack" button (the same as for sword) to perform.
Other modes: Press "Use slot 4" button to perform.

- {2115940151}
Press "Parry" button (the same as for sword) to perform.

- {2115940144}
{1077642}: Press movement buttons (to control direction, optional) + "Roll" (far distance) / "Dodge" (close distance) button to perform.
{1084067}: Press movement buttons (to control direction, optional) + "Use slot 4" button to perform.

- {2115940158}
{2115940165}: Select Yrden sign and hold "Cast sign" button to perform. Hold this button again to dispell.

The more you use the skill, the more powerful it becomes and more skill abilities are unlocked.
Follow the quest to find a teacher and learn new spells!

You are ready to learn new magic skills:
- {2115940146} ({2115940150}, {2115940149}, {2115940160})
- {2115940145}

You must visit {2115940199} to learn them.

- {2115940146} ({2115940148}, {2115940149}, {2115940160})
Press "Heavy attack" button or "Light attack + heavy attack modifier" (the same as for sword) to perform.
{2115940148} and {2115940149} take turns in a ratio of 2:1 (can be changed in player setup scene).
{2115940160} will be performed with 15% chance if victim has less than 15% of health. These values can be improved by practising.
NOTE: You can't use {2115940160} on bosses.

- {2115940145}
Open world map and click on any signpost icon to perform.

You are ready to learn new magic skills:
- {2115940152} ({2115940153}, {2115940154}, {2115940156})

You must visit {2115940199} to learn them.

- {2115940153}
Select Aard sign (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and press "Cast sign" button to perform.

WARNING: This spell always have a small chance to backfire you after expiration. You will feel (a label will appear) when this happens.
Practise (cast many times) a spell to reduce this chance.

- {2115940154}
Select Axii sign (default, can be changed in player setup scene), select target enemy and press "Cast sign" button to perform.

WARNING: This spell always have a small chance to backfire you after expiration. You will feel (a label will appear) when this happens.
Practise (cast many times) a spell to reduce this chance.

- {2115940156}
Select Quen sign (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and press "Cast sign" button to perform.

- {2115940155}
Select Igni sign (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and press "Cast sign" button to perform.

WARNING: This spell always have a small chance to backfire you after casting. You will feel (a label will appear) when this happens.
Practise (cast many times) a spell to reduce this chance.

- {2115940155}
Select Yrden sign (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and press "Cast sign" button to perform.

WARNING: This spell always have a small chance to backfire you after expiration. You will feel (a label will appear) when this happens.
Practise (cast many times) a spell to reduce this chance.

- {2115940162}
Select Aard sign (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and hold "Cast sign" button to perform.

WARNING: This spell always have a small chance to backfire you after casting. You will feel (a label will appear) when this happens.
Practise (cast many times) a spell to reduce this chance.

- {2115940163}
Select Axii sign (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and hold "Cast sign" button to perform.

WARNING: This spell always have a small chance to backfire you after casting. You will feel (a label will appear) when this happens.
Practise (cast many times) a spell to reduce this chance.

You are ready to learn new magic skills:
- {2115940158} ({2115940164}, {2115940166})

You must visit {2115940199} to learn them.

- {2115940164}
Select Igni sign (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and hold "Cast sign" button to perform.

WARNING: This spell always have a small chance to backfire you after casting. You will feel (a label will appear) when this happens.
Practise (cast many times) a spell to reduce this chance.

- {2115940166}
Select Yrden sign (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and hold "Cast sign" button to perform.
Customization [allows you to change visual and other aspects, always unlocked at skill level 1]
Special abilities [additional bonuses for the spell, do not affect stamina cost]
Double slash [additional slash gives +50% to damage]
Lightning rebound [additional lightning with 50% of damage strikes another opponent]
Full blast [spherical wave throws enemies from all sides]
Auto-Counter push [when teleporting to a new position, a counter push is performed with 40% chance, and +1% chance at each skill level]
Puppets upscaling [increases the target's level by 3 during control]
Max puppets [maximum of controlled entities in total, which can exist at the same time]
Max servants [maximum of summoned servants in total, which can exist at the same time]
Max tornados [maximum of created tornados in total, which can exist at the same time]
Following the player [servants follow the player]
Servant types [which servants you can summon, unlocked types can be selected in player setup scene]
Target pursuit [pursues a target during all the time]
Meteors count [number of meteors at one cast]
Damage control [the spell deals damage only to hostile entities, but the player still takes damage if the spell is BACKFIRING him]
Burning [sets enemies on fire for 5 seconds with a 20% chance, and +1% chance at each skill level]
Freezing [freezes enemies for 5 seconds with a 20% chance, and +1% chance at each skill level]
Lightnings/Meteors count [number of lightnings/meteors at one time interval]
